title: What should I do in Define Task?
content:
Provide parameters for your newontology building task. Fill the form on this page to define the task.

Task Name: Provide a name for your task/ontology. This name will be used in Task Manager and output folders (Input Folder Name + Task Name = Output Folder Name). You can come back later to continue building this ontology by going to Task Manager and resuming this task.

Selected Input Folder: Shown the input folder you selected for this task in the last step. Click Select Folder button to select a different folder if needed.

Select Taxon Group:Select a taxon group relevant/related to your input. System will use the resources (e.g., glossary) relevant to your taxon group in this task.

Ontology Prefix: Enter the prefix (short name) of the new ontology you will start to build.

title: What is an ontology prefix?
content: Each ontology needs a unique name called a 'prefix'. It is typically an acronym of the ontology's full name and should be a combination of a small number of English letters (may we suggest < 7)
